items.global.question: Question
items.auth.login.title: Sign-In
items.auth.alert.directSignIn.notAvailable: Your server is NOT capable of direct sign-in from this App. Instead, please follow the instructions below to complete sign-in on your web site.
items.auth.alert.directSignIn.help: Find out how to enable direct sign-in
items.auth.alert.directSignIn.question: Why direct sign-in?
items.auth.alert.directSignIn.answer: Direct sign-in allows typing your user name and password in this app, and storing your credential (i.e., a token) to save you from typing them again.
items.auth.directSignIn.step1: Click the Login button below to direct to your web site;
items.auth.directSignIn.step2: Complete login on your web site;
items.auth.directSignIn.step3: Close web page(s) and return here.
items.auth.directSignIn.done: It seems that you have finished login on your website. Please continue.
items.boot.title: Welcome
items.boot.error.msg: Yaosee store is not available this moment.
items.boot.error.fixHint: Please check your network and/or visit Yaosee help section for troubleshooting.
items.product.search.orderBy.Label: Sort by
items.product.search.publish.title: Publish
items.product.search.title: Searching products
items.settings.title: Settings
items.selectLang.title: Select Language
items.setup.title: Server setup
items.setup.intro: Please specify your server as below: server software platform such as nopcommerce, server url, and software version.
items.setup.error.invalidServer: Sorry, the given server did not seem to work. Please correct and try again! You also can continue if you are certain about the web site setting.
items.setup.message.validServer: The server at {url} has been successfully verified. Please continue. Thanks.
items.setup.demo.hint: With Demo mode on, your settings will not be saved. However, each time you restart the app, you will be asked for setting the server again.
